wikipedia_page.main:
Rosemary Johnson (1913–1972) was a British actress.
She is referred to in some sources as Rosemary Groom-Johnson.
Johnson worked mostly in television. A notable role was as the telephone operator Hilda Rowse in the 1964 Doctor Who serial Planet of Giants.

response: Forester's aide, Smithers (Reginald Barratt), arrives but does not report the murder for fear of undermining the DN6 project to which he has dedicated his life. Ian and Barbara hide inside Farrow's briefcase to avoid being stepped on by Forester and Smithers, and get separated from the Doctor and Susan after the briefcase is brought inside the house. The Doctor and Susan climb up a drain pipe to find them. Forester alters Farrow's report to give support to the DN6 licence application and, disguising his voice as Farrow’s, makes a supportive phone call to the ministry to the same effect. This is overheard by the local telephone operator Hilda Rowse (Rosemary Johnson) and her policeman husband Bert (Fred Ferris), who suspect something is wrong.
